quiz.question: ____ advantage
quiz.explanation: 优势, 利用。We should take advantage of this opportunity. 我们应该利用这个机会。

quiz.question: adverb ______
quiz.explanation: 副词, 副词短语。This is an adverb phrase in the sentence. 这是句子中的一个副词短语。

quiz.question: __ advertisement
quiz.explanation: 广告, 电视广告。I saw a TV advertisement for this product. 我看到了这个产品的电视广告。

quiz.question: ____ advice
quiz.explanation: 建议, 给予建议。Can you give advice on this matter? 你能对这件事给些建议吗?

quiz.question: advise _______
quiz.explanation: 建议, 建议不要。I advise against making this decision quickly. 我建议不要快速做这个决定。

quiz.question: ______ afford
quiz.explanation: 负担得起, 负担不起。We cannot afford to buy this house. 我们负担不起买这所房子。

quiz.question: afraid __
quiz.explanation: 害怕的, 害怕。She is afraid of the dark. 她害怕黑暗。

quiz.question: __ Africa
quiz.explanation: 非洲, 在非洲。Many unique animals live in Africa. 许多独特的动物生活在非洲。

quiz.question: after ___
quiz.explanation: 在...之后, 毕竟。After all, we did our best. 毕竟,我们已经尽力了。

quiz.question: ____ afternoon
quiz.explanation: 下午, 今天下午。I will see you this afternoon. 我今天下午会见你。
